trans-unit.source: Data restore on Synology can be performed with:

seg-source.mrk: Data restore on Synology can be performed with:

target.mrk: La restauration des données sur Synology peut être effectuée avec :

trans-unit.source: A cross or remote restore via the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> installed on another machine.

seg-source.mrk: A cross or remote restore via the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> installed on another machine.

target.mrk: Une restauration croisée ou à distance via un <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> installé sur une autre machine.

trans-unit.source: A web restore via a browser.

seg-source.mrk: A web restore via a browser.

target.mrk: Une restauration Web via un navigateur.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <MadCap:xref href="Cross_Restore.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Cross-Restore</MadCap:xref>, <MadCap:xref href="Remote_Restore.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Remote Restore</MadCap:xref> or <MadCap:xref href="Web_Restore.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Web Restore</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see <MadCap:xref href="Cross_Restore.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Cross-Restore</MadCap:xref>, <MadCap:xref href="Remote_Restore.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Remote Restore</MadCap:xref> or <MadCap:xref href="Web_Restore.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Web Restore</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Pour plus d'informations, voir <MadCap:xref href="Cross_Restore.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Cross-Restore</MadCap:xref>, <MadCap:xref href="Remote_Restore.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Remote Restore</MadCap:xref> ou <MadCap:xref href="Web_Restore.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Web Restore</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <MadCap:xref href="Cross_Restore_Mechanism.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Cross-Restore Mechanism</MadCap:xref>, <MadCap:xref href="Remote_Restore_Mechanism.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Remote Restore Mechanism</MadCap:xref> or <MadCap:xref href="Web_Restore.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Web Restore</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see <MadCap:xref href="Cross_Restore_Mechanism.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Cross-Restore Mechanism</MadCap:xref>, <MadCap:xref href="Remote_Restore_Mechanism.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Remote Restore Mechanism</MadCap:xref> or <MadCap:xref href="Web_Restore.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Web Restore</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Pour plus d'informations, voir <MadCap:xref href="Cross_Restore_Mechanism.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Cross-Restore Mechanism</MadCap:xref>, <MadCap:xref href="Remote_Restore_Mechanism.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Remote Restore Mechanism</MadCap:xref> ou <MadCap:xref href="Web_Restore.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Web Restore</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: To perform a cross or remote restore, the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> version must be equal to the one installed on the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Synology Agent. The <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server version can be equal to or higher than the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> version.

seg-source.mrk: To perform a cross or remote restore, the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> version must be equal to the one installed on the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Synology Agent.

The <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server version can be equal to or higher than the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> version.

target.mrk: Pour effectuer une restauration croisée ou à distance, la version de l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> doit être égale à celle installée sur l'Agent <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Synology.

La version du serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> peut être égale ou supérieure à la version de l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
